label: Lapsewood
description:
John awakens in a forest without leaves as Hubert walks over and introduces himself.
Hubert tells John that he brought him here, to help find out why Enchanted Lands has closed.
Hubert mentions that it's a good thing that he fell near the edge of Lapsewood, since it makes you forget things.
Hubert and John start walking out of the leafless forest.

When John wakes up, he sits up and looks around, noticing they seem to be in a leafless forest.
Getting to his feet, he notices other passengers walking around, gathering belongings and searching for loved ones.
A dwarf starts screaming for some item he's looking for.

Hit 1 if you wish to ask the dwarf what he's looking for.
Hit 2 if you wish to just start searching for anything unusual that a dwarf might want.

Hit 0 to quit.
